com.teamboid.twitterapi.dm

Interface DirectMessage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectMessageJSON

    public interface DirectMessage
extends java.io.Serializable
    Represents a direct message, sent to another user or received from another user.
    Author:
    Aidan Follestad

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Calendar getCreatedAt()
      Gets the date and time when the direct message was sent.
      long getId()
      Gets the ID of the direct message.
      User getRecipient()
      Gets the User object of the user that received the direct message.
      long getRecipientId()
      Gets the ID of the user that received the direct message.
      java.lang.String getRecipientScreenName()
      Gets the screen name of the User that received the message.
      User getSender()
      Gets the User object of the user that sent the direct message.
      long getSenderId()
      Gets the ID of the user that sent the direct message.
      java.lang.String getSenderScreenName()
      Gets the screen name of the user that sent the direct message.
      java.lang.String getText()
      Gets the text content of the direct message, will be 140 character or less in length.

    • Method Detail

      • getCreatedAt

        java.util.Calendar getCreatedAt()
        Gets the date and time when the direct message was sent.

      • getSenderScreenName

        java.lang.String getSenderScreenName()
        Gets the screen name of the user that sent the direct message.

      • getSender

        User getSender()
        Gets the User object of the user that sent the direct message. If you only want the screen name of the sending user, use getSenderScreenName()

      • getText

        java.lang.String getText()
        Gets the text content of the direct message, will be 140 character or less in length.

      • getRecipientScreenName

        java.lang.String getRecipientScreenName()
        Gets the screen name of the User that received the message.

      • getId

        long getId()
        Gets the ID of the direct message.

      • getRecipient

        User getRecipient()
        Gets the User object of the user that received the direct message. If you only want the screen name of the recipient user, use getRecipientScreenName()

      • getRecipientId

        long getRecipientId()
        Gets the ID of the user that received the direct message.

      • getSenderId

        long getSenderId()
        Gets the ID of the user that sent the direct message.
